summary: Contoso Wireless offers reliable internet with speeds up to 100 Mbps for downloading and 10 Mbps for uploading. The product also comes with unlimited data, no data caps, and 24/7 technical support. It starts at $49.99 per month and there is currently a promotion where customers can save $20 off their first month when signing up online or over the phone and using the promo code "SAVE20".
